description:
Kawamura Kumi is a 6th grade role model student of the wisteria class of the 9th elementary school and member of the http://anidb.net/ch27105 [Anti-Alien Squad]; the color of her http://anidb.net/ch27089 [Bougu] is light purple.
Kumi`s father died when she was four years old, so she helps http://anidb.net/ch27101 [her mother] with her work. She acts responsible and mature for her age and can deal calmly with aliens; she appears emotionally cold as result of having been exploited over years of tedious class rep work at school.
name: Kawamura Kumi
